name: LION (itch) (GAL Ramirez)
description:
The game is a MetroidVania RTS made only by Me, in this game you control a woman lost in a dimension of the other life, where she is instructed to locate 20 children and bring them to the gate of light which will allow them to be born, to do this she has to traverse this land, and use the children skills and defensive powers and weapons to get to the gate. 

You move the main character using WASD and command the children using the mouse, you can select them by clicking on them or using the status circle bars in HUD

There are 20 children to locate and save, you can think every one of them as your upgrades, also the quantity of them will be key to open certain gates, the children divide in 4 groups of 5, being color coded, each can activate a gate and open it using the switch of the color of the children and the indicated number of them, the blue ones require to collect blue gems keys to activate the Switch and green to select them and to shoot at the switch, the rest only have to step close the switch.

Also Be aware of the enemies or Specters that lie around, if a child losses all of his or her health will get stunned and the player must take the Woman to the child to reanimate him/her, also all enemies are also color coded, meaning enemies that have red Glowing sections are weak to red children and will cause 2 points of damage instead of one.
